tools.name: Figma
tools.description: A collaborative interface design tool that lets teams design, prototype, and collect feedback in a single platform.

tools.name: Jira
tools.description: Project management tool that allows agile teams to plan, track, and manage their work.

tools.name: Miro
tools.description: Online collaborative whiteboard platform perfect for brainstorming, planning, and team collaboration.

tools.name: ProductBoard
tools.description: Product management system that helps teams understand what users need, prioritize what to build, and rally everyone around the roadmap.

tools.name: Maze
tools.description: Rapid testing platform that helps teams collect and analyze user testing feedback.

tools.name: Notion
tools.description: All-in-one workspace for notes, documents, wikis, and project management.

tools.name: GitHub
tools.description: Version control and collaboration platform for software development and project management.

tools.name: Amplitude
tools.description: Product analytics platform that helps teams build better products through data-driven insights.

tools.name: Typeform
tools.description: Online form and survey platform that creates conversational data collection experiences.

tools.name: Linear
tools.description: Issue tracking and project management tool built for high-performance teams.

tools.name: Confluence
tools.description: Content collaboration software that helps teams create, organize, and collaborate on work.

tools.name: Hotjar
tools.description: Behavior analytics software that helps understand how users interact with your product.

tools.name: Replit
tools.description: Replit is an online development environment that allows users to write, compile, and run code in various programming languages.

tools.name: Adobe Podcast
tools.description: Adobe Podcast is a tool designed for creating professional podcasts, offering advanced features for audio editing and production.

tools.name: V0
tools.description: V0 is a platform that simplifies building and deploying serverless applications using a simple API and workflow.

tools.name: Bolt.New
tools.description: Bolt.New is a tool that enables developers to rapidly prototype web applications with a focus on simplicity and speed.

tools.name: Lovable
tools.description: Lovable is a tool designed to help teams deliver better product experiences with user feedback, insights, and collaboration.

tools.name: Smartsheet
tools.description: Smartsheet is a platform for work management and automation, enabling teams to collaborate and manage projects, processes, and work in real-time.

tools.name: Jira Product Discovery
tools.description: Jira Product Discovery is a tool to help product managers capture, prioritize, and validate ideas with their teams, transforming them into actionable product roadmaps.
